official_title: A resolution  expressing the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to the establishment of a national telecommunications policy.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that Congress should establish a national telecommunications policy.

titles.title: A resolution  expressing the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to the establishment of a national telecommunications policy.
